titles.title: Congratulating the University of Portland women's soccer team for winning the 2002 NCAA Division I national championship.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Mr. Isakson moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H. Res. 41.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 2/11/2003--Passed House without amendment. (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced in the House on January 29, 2003. The summary of that version is repeated here.)Congratulates the University of Portland women's soccer team for winning the 2002 NCAA Division I national championship.
